text: 13.16 Lep 14.9, 19.20, 20.4 Pen tap ladek kɨdeyɨl ak, ne binɨb yɨb yek okok yɨb ma yek okok, tap kuŋay yek okok tap ma yek okok, binɨb wog gɨñeb bɨawl olap muk okok mɨdebal okok binɨb wog gep bɨawl olap muk okok ma mɨdebal okok, kɨlop mɨdupsek agak, Yad nɨbop kod mɨdebin tek, kɨjɨkɨl yad ak nɨbop tɨkɨnɨgayn agak. Agɨl, mɨdupsek kɨjɨkɨl ne ak tɨkak. Ogɨnap kɨjɨkɨl ne anɨb ak ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd ak tɨkak, ogɨnap nebeŋ alaŋ tɨkak.
